name: api_rendering_Cubemap
description: Class for handling cube maps, Use this to create or modify existing cube map assets.

properties.name: desiredMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that the streaming system would load before memory budgets are applied.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The format of the pixel data in the texture (Read Only).

properties.name: loadedMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that is currently loaded by the streaming system.

properties.name: loadingMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level that the mipmap streaming system is in the process of loading.

properties.name: requestedMipmapLevel
properties.description: The mipmap level to load.

properties.name: streamingMipmaps
properties.description: Determines whether mipmap streaming is enabled for this Texture.

properties.name: streamingMipmapsPriority
properties.description: Sets the relative priority for this Texture when reducing memory size to fit within the memory budget.

properties.name: Cubemap
properties.description: Create a new empty cubemap texture.

properties.name: Apply
properties.description: Copies changes you've made in a CPU texture to the GPU.

properties.name: ClearRequestedMipmapLevel
properties.description: Resets the requestedMipmapLevel field.

properties.name: CopyPixels
properties.description: Copies pixel data from another texture on the CPU.

properties.name: GetPixel
properties.description: Gets the pixel color at coordinates (x, y).

properties.name: GetPixelData
properties.description: Gets the raw data from a texture.

properties.name: GetPixels
properties.description: Gets the pixel color data for a mipmap level of a face as Color structs.

properties.name: IsRequestedMipmapLevelLoaded
properties.description: Checks to see whether the mipmap level set by requestedMipmapLevel has finished loading.

properties.name: SetPixel
properties.description: Sets the pixel color at coordinates (x,y).

properties.name: SetPixelData
properties.description: Sets the raw data of an entire mipmap level of a face directly in CPU memory.

properties.name: SetPixels
properties.description: Sets the pixel colors of an entire mipmap level of a face.

properties.name: SmoothEdges
properties.description: Performs smoothing of near edge regions.

properties.name: UpdateExternalTexture
properties.description: Updates Unity cubemap to use different native cubemap texture object.
